> Megatron ducks the first missile, and the second explodes at his
> feet in front of him, blowing him backwards. The Pred Leader ignores
> his damages, and leaps up transforming into dragon form. He quickly
> starts accelerating away from the Maximal base.
>

{Talos}

    The mammoth watched as Megatron ran from the battle the limited
predicons trailing him. He sighed looking around at his fellow maximals and
the few autobots with them and nodded, it was a victory. Something to boost
morale even if only slightly. Turning he calle dout to his troops, "Maximals
dis-engage, get the injured back to base. I want a volunteer from the
uninjured bots to tack Megatron and his cronies, if they see you high tail
it back to base but try and get a reasonable location of the pred base."

    Turning he glared at Grimlock who was fuming, watching the predicons
escape. "As for you Grimlock, I don't care if you were a king or lord of the
entire universe. You're under my command here and when I give an order I
expect it to be carried out!"

    Growling Grimlock turned, the dinobots dino form eyes narrowing as it
regarded Talos, "Me Grimlock say me not follow bad orders. Me Grimlock
warrior! Me stay and munch predicon metal!"

    "You didn't even do that, or need I remind you your blasting flames only
helped to mask the predicons you over grown metallic lizard. But this isn't
the place. Transform and head back to base I'll deal with you later." Talos
growled turning to look over the energon and the scattered equipment picking
up some of the energon collection and proceeded to start filling some of the
containers. "Kup I'm going to need your help to transport this energon back
to base to restock our supplies."
